meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Greening Initiative
agenda_items.description: Authorize a fundraising and community engagement agreement with the Trust for Public Land (TPL) for the purpose of providing funding for equipment, design, and development of five parcels of City owned land.

agenda_items.title: Big Cedar Wilderness
agenda_items.description: Authorize the addition of Big Cedar Wilderness (282.9 acres of land) to the current Dallas Off-Road Bicycle Association Agreement.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Zoo
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Dallas Zoo South Garage.

agenda_items.title: Multiple Use Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a Multiple Use Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) for maintenance, repair, and operation of trail improvements.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl - Engineering Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an engineering services contract with Alliance Geotechnical Group, Inc. for the Cotton Bowl Renovation Project.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl - Architectural Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an architectural services contract with Overland Partners, Inc. for the Cotton Bowl Renovation Project.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl - Supplemental Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the construction manager at risk agreement with JE Dunn-Russell.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Bond Program: Update on Priority Project Lists
Bond Program
agenda_items.description: Consider and approve prioritized project lists for the Bond Program.

agenda_items.title: Director’s Performance Review
agenda_items.description: Closed session to discuss the evaluation and duties of the Director of the Park and Recreation Department.

financial_items.description: Construction services for Dallas Zoo South Garage
Engineering services for Cotton Bowl Renovation
Architectural services for Cotton Bowl Renovation
Supplemental Agreement for Cotton Bowl Renovation
